name: Ham and Swiss Frittata
description: No better brunchable or easy weeknight dinner with friends - all in one stove- and oven-safe pan.
preparation: Heat a frying pan over medium heat. Melt butter, add pepper, and 3 Onion Dip Mix. Saut√© for approximately 5 minutes.
Evenly spread ham across bottom of pan. Pour eggs into pan and cook for 5 minutes. With Corner Spatula, gently lift cooking egg to allow egg to flow to edges and evenly cook.
Once eggs start to set, sprinkle with Swiss cheese and place under broiler for 3 minutes, or until cheese is melted and pleasantly browned.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with steamed seasonal greens or baby salad tossed with Epicure dressing.
